com.imaginea.mongodb.common
Interface UserTokenInformation

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserTokenInformationProvider
public interface UserTokenInformation

A Token has been defined which is randomly generated for every user. Corresponding to every token there is a combination of username , mongoHost and mongoPort which describes the Mongo Instance on which that user works.

Author:
Rachit

Method Summary
 String generateTokenId()
          Generates a random 24 byte for every user.
 String getMongoHost()
          Get Mongo Host for a token.
 int getMongoPort()
          Get Mongo Port for a token.
 String getTokenId()
          Get tokenID for a token.
 String getUsername()
          Get UserName for a token.
 

Method Detail

generateTokenId

String generateTokenId()
Generates a random 24 byte for every user. This is used by SessionMongoInstanceProvider to search for a unique MongoInstance for that User.

Returns:
tokenId.
